messages.content:
Hello, how are you? Please respond as if you feel the same way as I feel.
after this message I will send another one, do not reply until the second message is sent
Hello! As an AI language model, I don't have emotions, but I'm here to help you with any questions or information you need. I'm looking forward to your second message.

I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling sad. Is there anything in particular that's causing you to feel this way? Sometimes talking about our feelings can help us feel better. If you'd like to talk about what's causing your sadness, I'm here to listen.

As an AI language model, I don't have emotions, but I'm here to assist you and provide helpful responses to the best of my abilities. My function is to help you, so please let me know if there's anything I can do to support you.
